page.title: 09Tourism - continued
page.content: Other facilities include a Cafe, Fish & Chip shop, Supermarket, crazy golf, solar-panel heated outdoor pool, Fort Laramie, pony trekking, 2 playgrounds, hairdressers, launderette, and a hire shop for BMX's, roller-skates, quadro- cycles, and an amusement arcade. There are other, smaller caravan parks in or near Silloth: {Hylton Park}is in town, {Tanglewood}is at Causewayhead, {Midtown}and{East Cote}at Skinburness, and two others at Blitterlees. There used to be a lot of bed and breakfast places before World War Two, but now it is the camping and caravan sites which bring most of the visitors to Silloth for their holidays. Many visitors come to see the annual Carnival which is held on August Bank Holiday Monday.
